content:
Q: What does Travel Protect360 Insurance cover?
A: We provide comprehensive travel insurance coverage of four (4) levels with diverse limits: Basic, Silver, Gold, and Platinum. Though the limits vary, the coverage is broad and has everything youâ€™re looking for in a travel insurance plan. All plans cover the following travel benefits: Overseas Medical Expenses (Child, Adult, Senior / Elderly) Medical Expenses in Singapore Personal Accident: Accidental Death & Permanent Disablement Travel Inconvenience Travel Postponement Travel Misconnections Insolvency of Travel Agency (Excluding Basic Plan) Trip Disruption Flight Inconvenience and Diversion Hijack of Common Carrier Kidnap & Hostage (Excluding Basic Plan) Personal Liability Loss of Home Contents Credit Card Protections (Excluding Basic Plan) Rental Car Excess Enhanced Medical Benefits due to COVID-19 (Excluding Basic Plan) Enhanced Travel Inconvenience, Cancellation, Postponement or Curtailment due to COVID-19 (Excluding Basic Plan) Chat with us if you have any questions via WhatsApp and we will be happy to answer your queries!
questions: How do the coverage limits differ among the Basic, Silver, Gold, and Platinum levels, and which benefits are excluded from the Basic Plan?
What types of medical expenses are covered overseas for different age groups, and how does this coverage integrate with medical expenses incurred in Singapore?
In what scenarios would the Personal Accident benefit apply, and how does it address accidental death versus permanent disablement?
How are travel inconveniences such as flight delays, diversions, and misconnections covered, and are there any differences in coverage between the plan levels?
What protections are provided under Travel Postponement, and how do these interact with exclusions related to COVID-19 or insolvency of travel agencies?
How does the policy cover insolvency of travel agencies, and why is this benefit excluded from the Basic Plan?
What circumstances trigger coverage for Trip Disruption, and how does this differ from Travel Postponement and Curtailment benefits?
How are hijack and kidnap & hostage situations covered, and why is the Kidnap & Hostage benefit excluded from the Basic Plan?
What does the Personal Liability coverage entail, and are there any conditions or exclusions specific to this benefit?
How is Loss of Home Contents covered during travel, and what documentation or proof might be required to support such claims?
What are the Credit Card Protections included in the plan, and why are these protections not available under the Basic Plan?
How does the Rental Car Excess coverage work, and are there any limitations or exclusions related to vehicle type or rental agreements?
What enhanced medical benefits are provided specifically due to COVID-19, and how do these differ from standard medical coverage?
How do the enhanced travel inconvenience, cancellation, postponement, or curtailment benefits due to COVID-19 operate, and why are they excluded from the Basic Plan?
Are there any age restrictions or special conditions for coverage of seniors or elderly travelers under Overseas Medical Expenses?
How does the policy define a Common Carrier for the purposes of hijack coverage, and what documentation is required to prove such an event?
What is the process for making inquiries or claims related to these benefits via WhatsApp, and are there any limitations to this communication channel?
How do the exclusions in the Basic Plan affect overall coverage for travelers concerned about COVID-19 related disruptions?
In cases where multiple benefits might apply, such as a hijack leading to trip disruption and personal accident, how does the policy coordinate coverage?
What are the implications of having comprehensive coverage with diverse limits across plans for travelers with varying risk profiles and travel needs?
